amendment.description: To increase funding for the Federal Air Marshals program, and the emergency preparedness operations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3616 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3616 proposed by Senator Frist to Amendment SA 3578. (consideration: CR S9053-9055; text: CR S9053) To increase funding for the Federal Air Marshals program, and the emergency preparedness operations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3616 proposed by Senator Frist to Amendment SA 3578.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3616 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
